Package VendingModel.ItemsSlotsClass

Class ItemsSlots

java.lang.Object
VendingModel.ItemsSlotsClass.ItemsSlots
public class ItemsSlots extends Object
This is an ItemSlots class. This represents the different slots on the vending machine. It contains the quantity of items, the price, the label of the slot, and the items in it.
